          <title>
            <string language="sl">Marta je na vozičku</string>
            <string language="en">Marta on a wheelchair</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Marta auf einem Rollstuhl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Marta sur un fauteuil roulant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Marta em um wheelchair</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Marta su una sedia a rotelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Μαρτα σε μια αναπηρική καρέκλα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Marta en un sillón de ruedas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učni list naj bi pripomogel k premagovanju zadrege ob otroku na invalidskem vozičku.</string>
            <string language="en">Short story equipped with pictures about young girl that had a car accident.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">invalid</string>
            <string language="en">invalid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">odnosi</string>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">voziček</string>
            <string language="en">wheelchair</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurze Geschichte ausgerüstet mit Abbildungen 
über junges Mädchen, das einen Autounfall hatte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire courte équipée des images au sujet de 
la jeune fille qui a eu un accident de voiture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">História curta equipada com os retratos sobre a 
menina nova que teve um acidente de carro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia corta dotata delle immagini circa la 
ragazza giovane che ha avuta un incidente di automobile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύντομη ιστορία που εξοπλίζεται με τις εικόνες για το 
νέο κορίτσι που είχε ένα ατύχημα αυτοκινήτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia corta equipada de los cuadros sobre la 
muchacha joven que tenía un accidente de coche.</string>
          </description>
